title: 3 Money Scripts You Inherited Without Even Knowing It
subtitle: Recognize and rewrite the subconscious beliefs affecting your financial decisions.
content:
3 Money Scripts You Inherited Without Even Knowing It

I'm Tyler, a former financial advisor and portfolio manager. If this is helpful, check out my new podcast, Your Money Guide on the Side, by clicking the link in my bio.

1. Fear of Checking Your Bank Account

Maybe your parents fought every time a bill came. Now you avoid checking your bank account like it's radioactive.

2. Guilt Over Spending

Or maybe you grew up hearing, “We can’t afford that,” even when you could. As a result, you feel guilty every time you buy something that brings you joy.

3. Money Scripts as Operating Systems

Money scripts are like operating systems. You didn’t choose them, but they run in the background and can crash your financial decisions when you least expect it.

Conclusion

If you want to change your money behavior, start by rewriting the script you didn’t even know you were reading from.
